Game Controls: Driver:
  • 'W, A, S, D' to move
  • 'R' to reset position
  • 'Left Shift' to hand break
  • 'SPACE' to use speed boost
  • 'T' toggle traction control
Shooter:
  • 'W, A, S, D' to turn
  • 'Left Click' to shoot
